author: Dameritter20
created_time: May 12, 2023, 12:27:45 PMLast edit: May 16, 2023, 09:28:11 PM by Dameritter20
content: WE ARE HIRINGJob Description:The GNN Crypto Marketing Agency is offering an opportunity to earn money. Getting started in crypto during the Alt season is the best decision you’d ever make. We are seeking a motivated and responsible Lead Generator/Sales Manager to work with us remotely.The ideal candidate should possess the following qualities: • Proficient in English communication • Results-oriented and responsible • Enjoys communicating with new and interesting people • Eager to enter or continue growth in the cryptocurrency field • Quick learner with a desire to grow and earn money • Possesses a laptop and reliable internetIf you have sales skills, we can help you reach your potential. However, if you do not possess sales skills, we are willing to teach you.As a Lead Generator/Sales Manager, you will be responsible for finding B2B leads using simple and clear resources and converting them into clients. We have a straightforward onboarding and growth system, where you can become a senior manager and receive up to 20% of the company's profit from the lead in 3-4 months.Our motivation and compensation structure is transparent and rewarding. For beginners, income will consist of a percentage of the profit from the client. As you reach certain results, we will discuss a monthly rate. Additionally, we will provide 24/7 information support.Join our team and take advantage of this exciting opportunity to grow and earn money. This is the perfect time to get started in crypto.Contact : @Dame_GNN on Telegram
